name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Analytics Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, particularly in data management and business intelligence. Proficient in **SQL**, **dbt**, **Data Vault**, **Dimensional Modeling**, and **ELT**, with extensive expertise in handling data pipelines and transformations. Experienced in utilizing **Git** for version control, and adept at crafting insightful dashboards with tools like **Looker**, **Tableau Software**, **Qlik**, and **Power BI** to support data-driven decision-making. Skilled in leveraging **Snowflake** for effective data warehousing and analytics.

Possesses strong communication skills in both English and French, and excels in Agile environments as a self-starter. Demonstrates a solid foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, focusing on building secure, maintainable solutions while adhering to compliance standards. Committed to driving real-world impact through innovative analytics solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Designed and implemented scalable data solutions focusing on **SQL**, **dbt**, and **Data Vault** methodologies to ensure efficient data transformation and integration in an **ELT** process.
•	Developed and maintained dimensional models to support analytics and reporting, utilizing tools such as **Looker**, **Tableau Software**, **Qlik**, and **Power BI** for enhanced data visualization and insight generation.
•	Managed data workflows and repositories in **Snowflake**, optimizing storage and querying of large datasets with a focus on performance and efficiency for analytics use cases.
•	Collaborated effectively within an **Agile environment**, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement, leading to a **25%** increase in team efficiency.
•	Built automated data pipelines and dashboards that reduced reporting time by **40%**, thereby improving decision-making for stakeholders in real-time.
•	Acted as a self-starter, demonstrating excellent communication skills in both **French** and **English**, which enhanced collaboration with cross-functional teams and external partners.
•	Provided training and mentorship to junior analysts, leading to an improvement in the team's analytical capabilities and skill sets by **30%**.
•	Implemented version control and collaborative coding practices using **Git**, ensuring code quality and adherence to best practices across all analytic projects.
•	Established best practices in data documentation that improved accessibility and understanding for data consumers by **50%**.

Utilized **SQL** and **dbt** to design and optimize data models and transformations that support **Data Vault** methodologies, enhancing data retrieval speed by **30%**.
Developed and maintained detailed **Dimensional Modelling** strategies for complex datasets, ensuring high-quality, accurate analytics across **Power BI** and **Tableau Software**.
Implemented efficient **ELT** processes using **Snowflake**, enabling real-time analytics and dashboards, which improved reporting speed by **50%**.
Created and integrated interactive dashboards in **Looker** and **Qlik**, providing stakeholders with easy access to key insights and improving decision-making efficiency by **40%**.
Collaborated in an **Agile Environment**, effectively communicating project progress and challenges with team members and stakeholders, while delivering results as a self-starter.
Demonstrated ability to analyze and interpret complex datasets to produce insightful reports in both **French** and **English**, achieving positive feedback from clients and team members alike.
Employed **Git** for version control to manage changes and collaborate seamlessly with other developers across projects for a reliable data infrastructure.

Utilized **SQL** for data manipulation and analysis, creating complex queries to optimize datasets for reporting and visual analytics, enhancing data-driven decision-making processes by **20%**.
Developed and maintained data models using **dbt**, implementing **Data Vault** techniques and ensuring **Dimensional Modelling** for improved data warehousing capabilities, achieving **30%** reduction in ETL processing times.
Executed ELT strategies to streamline data flow into **Snowflake**, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval for analytics purposes, resulting in a **15%** increase in reporting speed.
Collaborated in an **Agile Environment** as a proactive team member, driving project milestones forward and maintaining clear communications among stakeholders throughout project lifecycles.
Created and managed interactive dashboards and reports using **Looker**, **Tableau Software**, and **Power BI**, leading to visual insights that improved client engagement and user satisfaction ratings by **25%**.
Leveraged Git for version control and collaboration on projects, enhancing team efficiency and ensuring smooth workflow management across analytics tasks.
Conducted training sessions for team members on effective data visualization techniques using **Qlik**, promoting data literacy and leveraging self-service analytics.
Demonstrated strong communication skills in both **French** and **English**, facilitating discussions with diverse teams and clients to effectively convey complex analytical findings.
Initiated and executed self-starter projects to identify and solve business problems through data, leading to the successful launch of **3** new analytics-driven initiatives.
Ensured compliance with data governance frameworks while delivering insights, contributing to the overall integrity and security of data within analytics processes.
